awardEventDetails.title: 2020 Winner Artisan
awardEventDetails.for: Best Period and/or Character Makeup - Feature-Length Motion Picture
awardEventDetails.description: Nicki Ledermann - Tania Ribalow - Sunday Englis

awardEventDetails.title: 2020 Nominee Artisan
awardEventDetails.for: Best Contemporary Hair Styling - Feature-Length Motion Picture
awardEventDetails.description: Kay Georgiou - Vanessa Anderson - Mitchell Beck

awardEventDetails.title: 2020 Winner Chairman's Award
awardEventDetails.description: Joaquin Phoenix ("Joaquin Phoenix mesmerizes audiences in Joker with a performance that elicits empathy and reminds society on the whole that we can be better," said Festival Chairman Harold Matzner. "For this performance, another in his arsenal of unforgettable characters, we are honored to present Joaquin Phoenix with this year's Chairman's Award.")

awardEventDetails.title: 2020 Winner Creative Impact in Directing Award
2020 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (JOKER smiles while your heart is breaking. Todd Phillips' intoxicating take on Gotham's clown prince ignited a global following by inspiring audiences to consider the mask we wear to conceal the volcanic anxiety in the world today. Joaquin Phoenix's bravura performance is one for the ages - on the outside, exploding beyond the screen in a metamorphosis of balletic contortions - and on the inside, begging empathy for a madman as he dances down the steps of darkness.)
